subtitle: A light and refreshing dessert. A scrumptious alternative to cheesecake.

method.text: Place the rhubarb in a pan with the honey and water. Heat and simmer gently for about 5 min or until just soft. Leave to cool.
Heat the butter in a small pan. Stir in the biscuit crumbs and sugar.
Layer the rhubarb and crumb mixture into individual tall glass serving dishes.
Top with a spoonful of Greek yogurt and orange zest.

title: Rhubarb crunch
